title: cant switch email
body: I'm trying to change my email to my current one but need access to my old email. One problem with that my old email was hacked and I no longer have access to it. So was wondering if there is a way i can switch it without needing the old email.

replies.body: It won't be possible to manually change your registered email without access to the previous one.  No worries, we can help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help with updates.  We'll respond back asap!
